title: [Bug]: Fail to launch in Crostini (Chromebook Debian Linux container)
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

$ teams-for-linux  No config file found, using default values all good with appLogLevels you aren't using them Initialising logger with config: {"transports":{"console":{"level":"info"},"file":{"level":false}}} 11:47:36.650 › configPath: /home/myatescbk/snap/teams-for-linux/730/.config/teams-for-linux 11:47:36.657 › Running under Wayland, switching to PipeWire... dbus-send: /snap/teams-for-linux/730/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdbus-1.so.3: version `LIBDBUS_PRIVATE_1.12.20' not found (required by dbus-send) No protocol specified [5815:0118/114737.416344:ERROR:ozone_platform_x11.cc(245)] Missing X server or $DISPLAY [5815:0118/114737.416456:ERROR:env.cc(258)] The platform failed to initialize.  Exiting. Segmentation fault (core dumped) $

### What package are you using?

snap

### Version

1.12.5

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Install snapd - difficult, requiring squashfs-fuse, because all mounting is prohibited in the container
2. Install teams-for-linux
3. Attempt to run! 
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.If the libdbus issue is not critical, all other installed x11 apps run Ok in Crostini.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
myatescbk@penguin:~$ teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
No config file found, using default values
all good with appLogLevels you aren't using them
Initialising logger with config: "{}"
11:57:47.944 › File logging at /home/myatescbk/snap/teams-for-linux/730/.config/teams-for-linux/logs/main.log with level silly
11:57:47.948 › Console logging enabled with level silly
11:57:47.949 › Logger initialised
11:57:47.950 › configPath: /home/myatescbk/snap/teams-for-linux/730/.config/teams-for-linux
11:57:47.951 › configFile: {}
11:57:47.959 › Running under Wayland, switching to PipeWire...
dbus-send: /snap/teams-for-linux/730/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdbus-1.so.3: version `LIBDBUS_PRIVATE_1.12.20' not found (required by dbus-send)
No protocol specified
[5971:0118/115748.755877:ERROR:ozone_platform_x11.cc(245)] Missing X server or $DISPLAY
[5971:0118/115748.756029:ERROR:env.cc(258)] The platform failed to initialize.  Exiting.
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
```

### Additional context

_No response_
